title: Please help me identify the name of this font
author: YASSA2067

comments.content:
It's close to lhf pipeline  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-pipeline/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405004344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-pipeline/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-pipeline/")  
Some differences but can be modified if for a logo face
Most probably custom. [FF World](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405004344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-world) might be a good base font to start a customization on.
